name: LCD Games: Elf Panic
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: this game requires Apple Watch!

It's Christmas Eve in the great elf factory. Due to a poorly planned office party all but one of the elves have called in sick and everything has gone to hell in a hand basket. Jinx the elf is running around like a headless chicken, help him collect the presents before they smash and load them on Santa's sleigh.

Elf Panic is a frantically paced Apple Watch game in the style of a classic LCD handheld game from the 1980's. Use the digital crown to move Jinx. Collect presents as they drop from the conveyors and deliver them to the sleigh. Jinx can carry more than one present but points aren't awarded until they are on the sleigh.

Includes two game modes, GAME A for beginners and GAME B to skip straight to the action for advanced players.

Compare scores and challenge friends via Game Center using the iPhone app.
